title: New TraviBlog Search Feature
body: Users with a <A title="real browser" href="http://www.mozilla.org/products/firefox">real browser</A> just look in the lower right-hand corner of your browser (<A title="The New Netscape" href="http://www.microsoft.com/windows/ie/default.asp?TNN" name=TNN><ANCRONYM title="The New Netscape">TNN</ANCRONYM></A> users have to skip all the way down to the bottom of the page, and AIM users should click on the little <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/05/28/search_this_blog_with_google.aspx">#</a> to the left of the title to see any cool stuff). It's a pretty easy feature to add. Just paste this HTML into the bottom of your page:<br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New';COLOR: maroon">&lt;form id="Form2" method="get" action="http://www.google.com/search"&gt;<br /><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;input type="text" name="q" size="10" /&gt;<br /><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;input type="hidden" name="q" value="site:travis.servebeer.com" /&gt;<br /><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;input type="submit" value="google this site" /&gt;<br />&lt;/form&gt;</span><br /><br />...and I used this CSS to style it:<br/><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; COLOR: maroon; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">#Form2</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">{</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">width</span>:	<span style="COLOR: blue">100%</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">text-align</span>:	<span style="COLOR: blue">center</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">}</span><br /><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; COLOR: maroon; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">form[id=Form2]</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">{</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">width</span>: 	<span style="COLOR: blue">auto</span>	<span style="COLOR: blue">!important</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">text-align</span>: <span style="COLOR: blue">right</span>	<span style="COLOR: blue">!important</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">margin</span>: 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0px</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0px</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0px</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0px</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">padding</span>: 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0px</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0px</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0px</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0px</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">position</span>: 	<span style="COLOR: blue">fixed</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">bottom</span>: 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0px</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">right</span>: 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0px</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">}</span><br /><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; COLOR: maroon; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">form[id=Form2]</span> <span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="COLOR: maroon">input</span></span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">{</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	-<span style="COLOR: red">moz-opacity</span>: 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0.50</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">background-color</span>: 	<span style="COLOR: blue">rgba(255,</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">255,</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">255,</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">127)</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">}</span><br /><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; COLOR: maroon; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">form[id=Form2]</span> 	<span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="COLOR: maroon">input:HOVER</span>, <span style="COLOR: maroon">form[id=Form2]</span> 	<span style="COLOR: maroon">input:FOCUS</span>, <span style="COLOR: maroon">form[id=Form2]</span> 	<span style="COLOR: maroon">input:ACTIVE</span></span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">{</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	-<span style="COLOR: red">moz-opacity</span>: 	<span style="COLOR: blue">0.90</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'"><span style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>	<span style="COLOR: red">background-color</span>: 	<span style="COLOR: blue">rgba(255,</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">255,</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">255,</span> 	<span style="COLOR: blue">229)</span>;</span><br /><span style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Courier New'">}</span><br /><br />It's a great half-assed solution 'till <a href="http://scottwater.com/blog">.Text</a> gets upgraded. (I'm too lazy to recompile it myself)<br /><br />[EDIT] - many mispellings ;-)
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-05-28
